src:
Hasil Liga Europa: Man United Vs Partizan 3-0, Setan Merah Lolos
07 Nov 2019, 22:46 by Terjemahan, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Klub Liga Inggris Manchester United melaju ke babak 32 besar Liga Europa. Mereka lolos setelah mengalahkan Partizan Belgrade, asal Serbia, dengan skor 3-0 di Old Trafford, Jumat dinihari WIB, 8 November 2019.
MU tampil dominan di laga ini. Mereka meraih gol dari Mason Greenwood, Anthony Martial, dan Marcus Rashford.
Greenwood membuka keunggulkan MU pada menit ke-21. Gol ini berawal dari umpan diagonal Rashford yang membentur pemain bertahan Partizan. Greenwood menjangkau bola itu dan menjebol gawang lawan.
Hanya membutuhkan 12 menit bagi Setan Merah untuk memperbesar keunggulannya. Kali ini Greenwood yang berperan membantu Martial mencetak gol. Ia memblok sapuan pemain Partizan dan bola bergulir ke jalur Martial, yang mampu melewati kepungan dua bek lawan dan mencetak gol.
Gol ketiga MU tercipta pada menit ke-49. Rashford mencetak gol memanfaatkan kerja sama Juan Mata dengan Ashley Young .
Hasil ini menjaga posisi Manchester United di puncak klasemen Grup L. Tim asuhan Ole Gunnar Solskjaer itu mengemas 10 poin dari 4 laga, unggul 2 poin dari AZ Alkmaar yang di laga lainnya menang 5-0 di kandang Astana.
MU sudah unggul 6 poin dari Partizan di urutan ketiga. Dengan dua laga tersisa, mereka juga sudah unggul head-to-head dari pesaingnya itu, sehingga bisa memastikan diri tetap bertahan di posisi dua besar dan lolos ke babak berikut.
Manchester United memastikan diri lolos ke fase knockout Liga Europa. Tampil di hadapan pendukungnya sendiri, MU mengalahkan Partizan Belgrade 3-0 di laga Grup L.
Selain Man United, Sevilla (Spanyol) dan Celtic (Skotlandia) juga berhasil melaju ke babak berikutnya di Liga Europa.
Susunan Pemain
Manchester United: Romero, Young, Rojo, Maguire, Wan Bissaka, Mata, Fred, McTominay, Martial, Rashford.
Partizan Belgrade: Stojkoviv, Ostojic, Miletic, Urosevic, Pavlovic, Natcho, Scekic, Soumah, Zdjelar, Asano, Sadiq.
text:
Europa League Results: Man United vs Partizan 3-0, Red Devils Pass
Nov. 7, 2019, 22:46 by Translations, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - English Premier League club Manchester United cruised into the last 32 of the Europa League. They escaped after defeating Partizan Belgrade, from Serbia, with a score of 3-0 at Old Trafford, Friday morning WIB, November 8, 2019.
MU appears dominant in this fight. They won goals from Mason Greenwood, Anthony Martial, and Marcus Rashford.
Greenwood opened Manchester United's lead in the 21st minute. This goal originated from Rashford's diagonal pass that hit the defender Partizan. Greenwood reaches the ball and breaks the opponent's goal.
It only takes 12 minutes for the Red Devils to increase his superiority. This time Greenwood played the role of helping Martial score a goal. He blocked the sweep of a Partizan player and the ball rolled into the path of Martial, who was able to get past the siege of two opposing defenders and score.
MU's third goal was created in the 49th minute. Rashford scored using the cooperation of Juan Mata with Ashley Young.
These results keep Manchester United at the top of Group L. Ole Gunnar Solskjaer's team packed 10 points from 4 matches, 2 points ahead of AZ Alkmaar who in the other match won 5-0 at home to Astana.
MU is already 6 points ahead of Partizan in third. With two matches left, they also have superior head-to-head from competitors, so they can ensure themselves remain in the top two and qualify for the next round.
Manchester United made sure to qualify for the Europa League knockout phase. Appearing before his own supporters, Manchester United beat Partizan Belgrade 3-0 in Group L.
Besides Man United, Sevilla (Spain) and Celtic (Scotland) also managed to advance to the next round in the Europa League.
Line-up
Manchester United: Romero, Young, Rojo, Maguire, Wan Bissaka, Mata, Fred, McTominay, Martial, Rashford.
Partizan Belgrade: Stojkoviv, Ostojic, Miletic, Urosevic, Pavlovic, Natcho, Scekic, Soumah, Zdjelar, Asano, Sadiq.
